title: Apple iPhone 15 (Black, 128 GB)
highlights: A16 Bionic Chip, 6 Core Processor | Hexa Core
Attractive Selfies with Clear & Sharp Colours
description: 128 GB ROM. Store upto 3000 photos. A16 Bionic Chip, 6 Core Processor | Hexa Core. Superfast Multitasking. Extensive Gaming. 48MP + 12MP Rear Camera. DSLR Like Pictures & Great Zoom. 12MP Front Camera. Attractive Selfies with Clear & Sharp Colours. 6.1 inch All Screen OLED Display. Immersive Display. Enhanced Viewing Experience. 1 year warranty for phone and 1 year warranty for in Box Accessories.
